lemur
  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/auth | /authorities | /certificates | /defaults | /destinations | /domains | /endpoints | /logs | /notifications | /plugins | /roles | /sources | /users
 
/auth
GET /auth/me
POST /auth/login
 
/authorities
GET /authorities
GET /authorities/1
GET /authorities/1/roles
GET /authorities/1/visualize
POST /authorities
PUT /authorities/1
 
/certificates
GET /certificates
GET /certificates/1
GET /certificates/1/authority
GET /certificates/1/creator
GET /certificates/1/destinations
GET /certificates/1/domains
GET /certificates/1/key
GET /certificates/1/notifications
GET /certificates/1/replacements
GET /certificates/1/sources
GET /certificates/name/<query>
GET /certificates/valid/<query>
POST /certificates
POST /certificates/1/export
POST /certificates/1/update/owner
POST /certificates/1/update/switches
POST /certificates/upload
PUT /certificates/1
PUT /certificates/1/deactivate
PUT /certificates/1/description
PUT /certificates/1/revoke
DELETE /certificates/1
 
/defaults
GET /defaults
 
/destinations
GET /destinations
GET /destinations/1
POST /destinations
PUT /destinations/1
 
/domains
GET /domains
GET /domains/1
POST /domains
 
/endpoints
GET /endpoints
GET /endpoints/1
 
/logs
GET /logs
 
/notifications
GET /notifications
GET /notifications/1
GET /notifications/1/certificates
POST /notifications
PUT /notifications/1
 
/plugins
GET /plugins
GET /plugins/<name>
 
/roles
GET /roles
GET /roles/1
GET /roles/1/credentials
GET /roles/1/users
POST /roles
PUT /roles/1
DELETE /roles/1
 
/sources
GET /sources
GET /sources/1
POST /sources
PUT /sources/1
 
/users
GET /users
GET /users/1
GET /users/1/roles
POST /users
PUT /users/1
